title: Brand-New Hyatt Place Escape near Melbourne's Dandenong Ranges
description: Set your sights on a stylish stay at Hyatt Place Melbourne Caribbean Park,  just 30-minutes from Melbourne's CBD and framed by 275 acres of serene natural parklands and an 80-acre lake. This newly opened, innovative hotel delivers unparalleled comfort and is just a short drive from the Dandenong Ranges National Park, and is the perfect base to explore the wine country of the Yarra Valley or travel a little further to reach the surf of the Mornington Peninsula. As well as offering exceptional modern comforts and conveniences, this urban oasis boasts a stylish onsite eatery, Archieâ€™s Farm Restaurant & Bar and the sleek Lobby Lounge & Bar, along with a modern fitness centre.
